title: Russian Missiles Deliver New Woe to Kyiv, Knocking Out Tap Water
description: Moscow kept up its campaign to destroy civilian infrastructure, in an apparent bid — so far unsuccessful — to break Ukrainian morale by making cities unlivable.
dc:creator: Marc Santora and Matthew Mpoke Bigg

media:content.media:credit: Brendan Hoffman for The New York Times
media:content.media:description: Collecting drinking water from public taps in Shevchenko Park on Monday in Kyiv.
